name: Exxon Mobil Corporation
summary: Exxon Mobil Corporation is the largest U.S.-based oil and gas company and one of the world’s largest publicly traded energy providers. Formed in 1999 by the merger of Exxon and Mobil, the company is vertically integrated across oil, gas, and chemicals, with operations spanning exploration, production, refining, and petrochemicals. ExxonMobil is headquartered in Spring, Texas, and is listed on the NYSE under the ticker XOM.
